BuffDescription.Featherfall: Press UP or DOWN to control speed of descent
BuffDescription.Spelunker: Shows the location of treasure and ore
BuffDescription.ShadowOrb: A magical orb that provides light
BuffDescription.Merfolk: Can breathe and move easily underwater
BuffDescription.Silenced: Cannot use items that require mana
BuffDescription.Horrified: You have seen something nasty, there is no escape.
BuffDescription.TheTongue: You are being sucked into the mouth
BuffDescription.PetBunny: I think it wants your carrot
BuffDescription.BabyPenguin: I think it wants your fish
BuffDescription.PaladinsShield: 25% of damage taken will be redirected to another player
BuffDescription.Frostburn: It's either really hot or really cold. Either way it REALLY hurts
BuffDescription.BabyEater: A baby Eater of Souls is following you
BuffDescription.Chilled: Your movement speed has been reduced
BuffDescription.Pygmies: The pygmies will fight for you
BuffDescription.BabyHornet: It thinks you are its mother
BuffDescription.TikiSpirit: A friendly spirit is following you
BuffDescription.PetSapling: A little sapling is following you
BuffDescription.ShadowDodge: You will dodge the next attack
BuffDescription.LeafCrystal: Shoots crystal leaves at nearby enemies
BuffDescription.BabyDinosaur: A baby dinosaur is following you
BuffDescription.BabySlime: The baby slime will fight for you
BuffDescription.EyeballSpring: An eyeball spring is following you
BuffDescription.BabySnowman: A baby snowman is following you
BuffDescription.Ravens: The ravens will attack your enemies
BuffDescription.BlackCat: A black kitty is following you
BuffDescription.CursedSapling: A cursed sapling is following you
BuffDescription.ChaosState: Using the Rod of Discord will take life
BuffDescription.BabyGrinch: A baby grinch is following you
BuffDescription.BeetleMight1: Melee damage and speed increase by 10%
BuffDescription.BeetleMight2: Melee damage and speed increase by 20%
BuffDescription.BeetleMight3: Melee damage and speed increase by 30%
BuffDescription.Sonar: You can see what's biting your hook
BuffDescription.Crate: Greater chance of fishing up a crate
BuffDescription.HornetMinion: The hornet will fight for you
BuffDescription.ImpMinion: The imp will fight for you
BuffDescription.TurtleMount: Slow if by land, zoom if by sea
BuffDescription.SpiderMinion: The spider will fight for you
BuffDescription.TwinEyesMinion: The twins will fight for you
BuffDescription.PirateMinion: The pirate will fight for you
BuffDescription.MiniMinotaur: How do you defeat a mini Minotaur?
BuffDescription.SharknadoMinion: The sharknado will fight for you
BuffDescription.UFOMinion: The UFO will fight for you
BuffDescription.UFOMount: It's a good thing you had a MAC
BuffDescription.MoonLeech: You are unable to absorb healing effects
BuffDescription.Sunflower: Movement speed increased and monster spawns reduced
BuffDescription.MonsterBanner: Increased damage and defense from the following:
BuffDescription.Rabies: Increased damage, Decreased life regen, Causes status effects
BuffDescription.MagicLantern: An enchanted lantern is lighting your way
BuffDescription.CrimsonHeart: A magical heart that provides light
BuffDescription.BabyFaceMonster: A baby face monster is following you
BuffDescription.StardustMinion: The stardust cell will fight for you
BuffDescription.DryadsWardDebuff: The power of nature compells you
BuffDescription.StardustGuardianMinion: The stardust guardian will protect you
BuffDescription.StardustDragonMinion: The stardust dragon will protect you
BuffDescription.SuspiciousTentacle: A suspicious looking eye that provides light
BuffDescription.CompanionCube: Will never threaten to stab you and, in fact, cannot speak
BuffDescription.PetDD2Gato: A propeller gato is following you
BuffDescription.Oiled: Taking more damage from being on fire
BuffDescription.DeadlySphere: The Deadly Sphere will fight for you
BuffDescription.DryadsWard: The power of nature protects you
BuffDescription.ParryDamageBuff: 500% increased damage for next melee strike
BuffDescription.BallistaPanic: Your ballistas rapidly shoot in panic!
BuffDescription.SolarShield1: Damage taken reduced by 30%, repel enemies when taking damage
BuffDescription.SolarShield2: Damage taken reduced by 30%, repel enemies when taking damage
BuffDescription.SolarShield3: Damage taken reduced by 30%, repel enemies when taking damage
BuffDescription.NoBuilding: You have lost the power of creation!
BuffDescription.WeaponImbueVenom: Melee attacks inflict venom on your targets
BuffDescription.WeaponImbueCursedFlames: Melee attacks inflict enemies with cursed flames
BuffDescription.WeaponImbueFire: Melee attacks set enemies on fire
BuffDescription.WeaponImbueGold: Melee attacks make enemies drop more gold
BuffDescription.WeaponImbueConfetti: Melee attacks cause confetti to appear

ArmorSetBonus.SquireTier3:
Increases your max number of sentries
Greatly enhances Ballista effectiveness
ArmorSetBonus.ApprenticeTier3:
Increases your max number of sentries
Greatly enhances Flameburst effectiveness
ArmorSetBonus.HuntressTier3:
Increases your max number of sentries
Greatly enhances Explosive Traps effectiveness
ArmorSetBonus.MonkTier3:
Increases your max number of sentries
Greatly enhances Lightning Aura effectiveness
ArmorSetBonus.SquireTier2:
Increases your max number of sentries
Ballista pierces more targets and panics when you take damage
ArmorSetBonus.ApprenticeTier2:
Increases your max number of sentries
Flameburst field of view and range are dramatically increased
ArmorSetBonus.HuntressTier2:
Increases your max number of sentries
Explosive Traps recharge faster and oil enemies
Set oiled enemies on fire for extra damage
ArmorSetBonus.MonkTier2:
Increases your max number of sentries
Lightning Aura can now crit and strikes faster
ArmorSetBonus.Frost: Melee and ranged attacks cause frostburn
ArmorSetBonus.Tiki: Increases your max number of minions
ArmorSetBonus.Palladium: Greatly increases life regeneration after striking an enemy
ArmorSetBonus.Orichalcum: Flower petals will fall on your target for extra damage
ArmorSetBonus.Titanium: Become immune after striking an enemy
ArmorSetBonus.Chlorophyte: Summons a powerful leaf crystal to shoot at nearby enemies
ArmorSetBonus.SpectreHealing: Magic damage done to enemies heals the player with lowest health
ArmorSetBonus.Shroomite:
Not moving puts you in stealth,
increasing ranged ability and reducing chance for enemies to target you
ArmorSetBonus.SpectreDamage: Magic damage done will hurt extra nearby enemies
ArmorSetBonus.BeetleDamage: Beetles increase your melee damage and speed
ArmorSetBonus.Ninja: 33% chance to not consume thrown item
ArmorSetBonus.Fossil: 50% chance to not consume thrown item
ArmorSetBonus.Solar:
Solar shields generate over time protecting you,
consume the shield power to dash, damaging enemies
ArmorSetBonus.Vortex:
Double tap {0} to toggle stealth,
increasing ranged ability and reducing chance for enemies to target you but slowing movement speed
ArmorSetBonus.Nebula:
Hurting enemies has a chance to spawn buff boosters,
pick boosters up to get stacking buffs
ArmorSetBonus.Stardust: Double tap {0} to direct your guardian to a location
ArmorSetBonus.Forbidden: Double tap {0} to call an ancient storm to the cursor location
